author: CmsHI
body:
Updated Event plane data format for Heavy Ion Run2.
Updated flattening and calibration.
We have a [twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/SWGuideHeavyIonFlatEvtPlane) page, and  [slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/360288/contribution/3/material/slides/0.pdf).
title: Event plane data format for Heavy Ion
